quote: If you're running a dictatorship, you don't really have to worry about the welfare or the property rights of the ordinary citizen. Only the people who keep you in power, a very small group, matter.
quote_letters: IF YOURE RUNNING A DICTATORSHIP YOU DONT REALLY HAVE TO WORRY ABOUT THE WELFARE OR THE PROPERTY RIGHTS OF THE ORDINARY CITIZEN ONLY THE PEOPLE WHO KEEP YOU IN POWER A VERY SMALL GROUP MATTER
